The Duality of Language: Marking International Mother Language Day

Essay marking International Mother Language Day, on the duality of linguistic identity in Sri Lanka.

Year 2016
Context Personal
Status Completed

An essay published in Groundviews on International Mother Language Day 2016, reflecting on what it means to hold two linguistic identities simultaneously in Sri Lanka — and what typography’s role is in that duality.
